channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Bins piling up, 22nd December
item.description:
Regular and recycling bins outside commercial property dont ever seem to be collected and rubbish piling up.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20-24, Chase Side, Southgate, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lots of leaves, hasn’t been cleared in too long, 22nd December
item.description:
There are lots of leaves on this pavement especially at the kerb and they haven’t been cleared in so long that they’ve been turning into an unpleasant sludge making it difficult to cross the road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, Aylesbury Road, Shortlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Fly tipping and builder rubble Bournemouth Close, 22nd December
item.description:
Please see pictures of rubbish and waste ok Bournemouth close. The situation is getting worse in and around the area of Peckham Palms and City Foods. This is an issue on both public and private land. Please investigate and enforce against private residents if necessary. Vermin are now eating the discarded food

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, Bournemouth Close, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipped sofa, 22nd December

item.title: Dead fox (reported on Friday), 22nd December
item.description:
Hi, I reported and paid for a dead fox to be picked up on Friday. I realised that I did public place instead of private property, and I think that has caused an issue as nobody has picked it up. I think someone drove passed on Friday but didn’t stop but maybe as the information I didn’t pay from a private property had happened. I would appreciate if this could be dealt with ASAP given it’s been there all weekend and I have paid £80 for privilege. Thanks David
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 69, Murchison Avenue, Albany Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
